name: 汪昆立
objective: 本課程是化工系必修的基礎課程，目的是學習反應器的基本原理與設計，包括化學反應動力、實驗設計與數據分析以及反應程序最適化。訓練學生解決問題的能力，進而培養創造力，以運用、評估或設計在化學工業的反應器。本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論。
schedule:
1. Mole Balances (Chapter 1)
2. Conversion and Reactor Sizing (Chapter 2)
3. Rate Laws and Stoichiometry (Chapter 3)
4. Isothermal Reactor Design (Chapter 4)
5. Collection and Analysis of Rate Data (Chapter 5)
6. Non-elementary reaction Kinetics(Chapter 7)
7. Catalysis and Catalytic Reactors (Chapter 10)
8. Distributions of Residence Times for Chemical Reactors (Chapter 13)
scorePolicy: Middle Examination 40%、Final Examination 40%、Usual Appearance 20%.There will be severe penalty for being late or not attending the class. The maximum penalty will be the flunk at the end of semester.
materials:
H. Scott Fogler, ”Elements of Chemical Reaction Engineering,” 3rd edition, Prentice Hall PTR, 1999
